about_the_game:
Mini-Dungeon Monthly #2


Introducing Mini- Dungeon Monthly , the monthlyRPG zine from AAW Games!

Each issue features five brand-new Mini- Dungeonadventures for Dungeons & Dragons5th Edition.

Want the digital color map and token pack? Subscribe to Mini- Dungeon Monthlyin PDF and print!

Five adventures included!

Considering Bees
An adventure for four characters of 2nd level by Thomas Baumbach

Umbravania: The Tirade of Doctor Livingstone
An adventure for four characters of 3rd to 5th level by Justin Andrew Mason

Roots of Yggdrasil
An adventure for four characters of 5th to 8th level by Jonathan G. Nelson

Malice on Jade Mountain
An adventure for four characters of 10th to 12th level by Jonathan G. Nelson

Carnival of the Clown King
An adventure for any number of characters of any level by Justin Andrew Mason

Converted by: Russell Campbell

Released on August 08, 2019. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.3.7 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and the included 5E Compatible ruleset.
detailed_description:
Mini-Dungeon Monthly #2


Introducing Mini- Dungeon Monthly , the monthlyRPG zine from AAW Games!

Each issue features five brand-new Mini- Dungeonadventures for Dungeons & Dragons5th Edition.

Want the digital color map and token pack? Subscribe to Mini- Dungeon Monthlyin PDF and print!

Five adventures included!

Considering Bees
An adventure for four characters of 2nd level by Thomas Baumbach

Umbravania: The Tirade of Doctor Livingstone
An adventure for four characters of 3rd to 5th level by Justin Andrew Mason

Roots of Yggdrasil
An adventure for four characters of 5th to 8th level by Jonathan G. Nelson

Malice on Jade Mountain
An adventure for four characters of 10th to 12th level by Jonathan G. Nelson

Carnival of the Clown King
An adventure for any number of characters of any level by Justin Andrew Mason

Converted by: Russell Campbell

Released on August 08, 2019. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.3.7 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and the included 5E Compatible ruleset.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation

name: Fantasy Grounds - Mini-Dungeon Monthly #2 (5E)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
